recommendationsList.name: Marian Zburlea
recommendationsList.recomText: Valentina is a highly creative and easy-going person to work with. She is multi-skilled, has a vast knowledge in web development in general and frontend development in particular with jaw-dropping CSS skills

recommendationsList.name: Chloe
recommendationsList.recomText: Valentina is proactive, self motivated, intelligent, keen to learn new technologies, always updating her knowledge/skills and keen to share her vast knowledge with any and all. It was a pleasure working with her. Valentina makes a great addition to any team!

recommendationsList.name: Alan Wright
recommendationsList.jobTitle: Senior Project Manager at Newton Investment Management
recommendationsList.recomText: Valentina has done a fantastic job on UI development while working for me on a Digital Transformation Programme of work at Direct Line. Her work rate is high and output is of equally high quality. She has proved to be a great enabler in assisting me to deliver the Programme of work that I have been overseeing.
